SELECT t.id, t.title, t.code, t.pid, t.path, t.sort, t.grade from sys_menu t LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu s on t.id = s.menu_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role o on s.role_id = o.role_id where t.state = true and t.admin_hide = #{adminHide} and o.user_id = #{userId}
and t.grade = #{grade}
mapper.select: select id from sys_menu where pid = #{pid} and state = true order by id desc limit 1
